name: Scarlet Stand
ability: Restores 1% HP to Festival Doll team members every 5 seconds.
All melee foes take slightly more DMG at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the red-carpeted stand upon which the dolls are arranged during the Doll Festival. Also a proud member of the Festival Doll Imperial Guard, he does everything from serving as a bodyguard to the festival dolls, to helping prepare the festival itself. He is so competent that he's handling the preparation of this year's historically large-scale Doll Festival with the help of only a few others.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 15/02/17- 08/03/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 05/03/17 - 08/03/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases total Event Points by 33% during the "The Spirits' Doll Festival" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 15/02/17- 08/03/17

main: "In the name of the Imperial Guard, I vow to protect you!"
limit_break: "I need to be strong so that I can protect everyone!"
